Name: Age of Dynasty
About the game: The current stage is an alpha stage! The game currently has a content game length of about 2hrs! Age of Dynasty is an open-world survival game that spans from the end of the Stone Age to the future. Every playthrough is different because of randomly generated worlds and the possibility to play together with your friends. As a young woman/man you have to fight your way through the last days of the ice age and end the age of hunter-gatherers. You'll have to build a city and manage its inhabitants to reach new eras and always unlock new buildings and items. This is the link to the official discord server, where you can get more information and updates.
